ai-patthana8.22:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, illustrious and confusion,
ai-patthana8.22:1.1_0: Not for the sake of consciousness, nor associated with people.
ai-patthana8.22:1.1_1: Not understanding the teaching associated with fetters, nor by relying on people.
ai-patthana8.22:2.1_0: Not for the sake of extremely for the sake of veneration, or for the sake of sacrifice.
ai-patthana8.22:2.1_1: Not for the sake of exertion, nor for the sake of veneration, conditioned by knowledge.
ai-patthana8.22:2.1_2: nor do they arise for the sake of worry, but not for the sake of fetters.
ai-patthana8.22:3.1_0: Not for the sake of liking the people is not associated with fetters, nor by associated with knowledge.
ai-patthana8.22:3.1_1: Not for the sake of liking the fetters and associated with fetters, nor by relying on people.
ai-patthana8.22:3.1_2: Not for the sake of another, or that associated with the shackles, nor connected with the fetters, but not for any other reason.
ai-patthana8.22:3.1_3: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana8.22:4.1_0: ‘... for the sake of nine objects.’ ...
